title: Nobel Peace Prize 2025: María Corina Machado
author: pykello
aiHeadline: Nobel Peace Prize 2025 goes to María Corina Machado, proving that sometimes even the most controversial figures get their 15 minutes of fame, or in this case, a Nobel Prize.

title: Ryanair flight landed at Manchester airport with six minutes of fuel left
author: mazokum
aiHeadline: Ryanair flight lands at Manchester with just six minutes of fuel left, because nothing says 'safe travel' like cutting it down to the wire and hoping the landing goes smoothly.

title: Show HN: I invented a new generative model and got accepted to ICLR
author: diyer22
aiHeadline: Some guy invents a new generative model and gets accepted to ICLR, because clearly the world needs another AI model, and this one is definitely going to change everything... or maybe not.

title: Liquid Glass Is Cracked, and Usability Suffers in iOS 26
author: uxjw
aiHeadline: Liquid Glass is cracked in iOS 26, and usability suffers, because who needs a smooth user experience when you can have a shiny new feature that doesn't work as intended?

title: Igalia, Servo, and the Sovereign Tech Fund
author: robin_reala
aiHeadline: Igalia partners with Servo and the Sovereign Tech Fund, proving that even in the tech world, sometimes you just need a good partnership to make things work, or at least look like they're working.
